item.title: gmailcheck
item.description: I’m just not that big a fan of usability, at least not for myself. To be clear, I do care about things being usable, but only enough to delay the eventual onslaught of social alienation. I drink water out of bowls, but only when the apartment is out of cups; I use xmonad as my window manager, but not at potlucks. Thus far in my computer-using life, I’ve never owned a monitor.
